title: Featured Projects
description: A selection of projects that showcase problem-solving abilities, technical depth, and architectural thinking.

projects.title: TACO
projects.description: Commission management System for Insurance Agencies and Brokers
projects.problem: Insurance agencies and brokers face challenges in managing commissions efficiently, leading to delays and inaccuracies in payments. As well as spending excessive time on manual tracking and reporting.
projects.solution: Developed TACO, a web application that automates commission tracking, calculation, and reporting. It provides real-time updates and insights into commission statuses, improving transparency and efficiency.
challenges: Designing a scalable architecture to handle complex commission structures
Implementing real-time data synchronization across multiple users
Ensuring data security and compliance with industry regulations

projects.title: AudioBookSync
projects.description: Seamless audiobook synchronization platform for Audible users
projects.problem: Users struggle with not actually owning the books they purchase on Audible, leading to issues when switching devices or platforms.
projects.solution: Developed a cloud-based sync system that allows users to upload their Audible audiobooks and sync playback progress across multiple devices.
challenges: Syncing audio playback timestamps across devices accurately
Handling offline scenarios with eventual consistency
Optimizing cloud storage for media metadata

projects.title: Home Lab Infrastructure
projects.description: Self-hosted infrastructure with Proxmox, Docker, and networking
projects.problem: Need for a scalable, self-hosted infrastructure to run multiple services while maintaining security, monitoring, and ease of deployment.
projects.solution: Built a complete home lab environment using Proxmox for virtualization, Docker for containerization, and Traefik for intelligent routing and reverse proxying.
challenges: Setting up secure networking with proper firewall rules
Managing SSL certificates and automatic renewal
Implementing proper monitoring and alerting systems
